internetConnection: Connect to the Internet to browse for more ReadAskChat story packs.

buttonText.syncAllStoryButtonText: Sync All Stories Listed Below to Device.

arrTitles.arrTitles1: We help you and your child talk about stories together!

arrTutorialDesc.arrTutorialDesc0: Take this quick tour to see how to make the most of your read-aloud time.
arrTutorialDesc.arrTutorialDesc1: There are no “right answers” to our open-ended questions!

index0BottomText.index0BottomText0: Our library is designed to help families have fun
index0BottomText.index0BottomText1: reading and talking about stories TOGETHER.

index1BottomText.index0BottomText1: on each page suggest what you can

index2BottomText.index0BottomText1: at the art with your child.
index2BottomText.index0BottomText5: with your child about ideas in the stories.

loginPage.titleLabel: Sign in to read the full library.
loginPage.invalidErrorMsg: Please provide valid an email and password.
loginPage.loginFail: Something went wrong please try again.

setForgotPasswordPage.subTitleLabel: Enter the OTP and new password.

forgotPasswordPage.subTitleLabel: Enter the registered email address below and we will send you a link to reset your password.

registerPage.subTitleLabel: Registering will enable you to access the content from any of your devices
registerPage.privacyPolicy: I have read and agree with Tattlebox
registerPage.missingPassword: Password must contain at lest 6 characters.
registerPage.missingConfirmPassword: Confirm password must contain at lest 6 characters.
registerPage.privacyPolicyErrorMsg: Please agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.
registerPage.signUpError: Unfortunately we were unable to create your account.

linkDevicePage.desc1: Make sure the Tattlebox is switched off
linkDevicePage.desc2: Enter the link code (items 1/2 from initial view)
linkDevicePage.desc3: Once entered, click the LINK button
linkDevicePage.shortDesc1: Plug-in your Tattlebox Monitor, making sure it is right side up, and turn it ON.
linkDevicePage.shortDesc2: The first three LED lights will light up solid in order:
linkDevicePage.shortDesc3: If a GPS lock cannot be acquired, the third light will flash every second for about a minute.  If this occurs the monitor is functioning, but it could not get a GPS lock.  All other aspects should work.
linkDevicePage.shortDesc4: The first LED will light up almost immediately, the second LED could take 10 – 15 seconds, and the third LED up to three minutes.
linkDevicePage.bottomText: Only click Continue once the bottom LED has lit up.

profilePage.profileUpdateSucess: Your profile has been updated successfully
profilePage.profileUpdateFail: Something went wrong please try again.
profilePage.logoutTextDesc: This will log you out of your account, but you’re Tattlebox will still be connected to this account when you next sign in.

settingPage.boatDescText: This description will be sent in the body of alert emails.  If an alert recipient is not familiar with your boat or its location, this description can be used to help them identify your boat.
settingPage.unlinkAlertText: Are you sure you want to unlink this Tattlebox?
settingPage.deleteTattleboxText: Are you sure you want to delete this Tattlebox?
settingPage.settingUpdateSucess: Your profile has been updated successfully
settingPage.settingUpdateFail: Something went wrong please try again.
settingPage.unlinkTextDesc: This will revert the device back to it’s factory settings and remove this from your app.
settingPage.unlinkAlertTextDesc: This will revert the device back to it’s factory settings and remove from the app
settingPage.powerModeDesc: Please note, regardless of Power Mode your Tattlebox will immediately send alerts as alert conditions are detected.
settingPage.lowPowerModeDesc: Your Tattlebox will check in for pending configuration changes or media requests once a day.
settingPage.StandardPowerModeDesc1: Your Tattlebox will check in for pending configuration changes or media requests once an hour.
settingPage.StandardPowerModeDesc: This means it could take up to an hour for configuration changes or media requests to be processed. Your Tattlebox will send sensor data every hour as it checks in.  In this mode a fully charged internal battery will last a few weeks.  Data consumption is normal.
settingPage.highPowerModeDesc: Configuration changes or media requests are processed immediately. Your Tattlebox will send sensor data every hour.
settingPage.motionDetectorDesc: If enabled, the motion detector should detect human movement within a 5-meter (15 foot) distance and 90-degree field of view.
settingPage.SoundDetectorDesc: If enabled the sound detector will send an alert when sound reaches a certain level.
settingPage.accelerometerTiltDesc: If enabled the Accelerometer Tilt sensor will detect if the orientation of the monitor changes by more than approximately 35 degrees in a 2-second window.
settingPage.accelerometerSignificantMotionDesc: The Accelerometer Significant Motion sensor will detect if the monitor has moved more than a few meters in a short time frame.
settingPage.temperatureDesc: If enabled the temperature sensor requires you to configure low and high temperature thresholds.
settingPage.humidityDesc: If enabled the humidity sensor requires you to configure low and high relative humidity thresholds.
settingPage.USBPowerDesc: If enabled the USB Power sensor will send an alert each time the power state changes (on to off, and off to on).
settingPage.1224PowerDesc: If enabled the 12/24V Power sensor will send an alert each time the power state changes (on to off, and off to on).
settingPage.1224VoltageDesc: If enabled the 12/24 V Voltage sensor requires you to configure low and high voltage thresholds.
settingPage.BilgePumpDesc1: Send Alert if input shows continuously running for more than…
settingPage.BilgePumpDesc2: Send Alert if input shows running for more than multiple times in a period
settingPage.TmateRadio3: Alert when goes high or low
settingPage.CameraSettingsText2: Take Picture if Motion Detector Alert Occurs
settingPage.CameraSettingsText3: Records Sound if Motion Detector Alert Occurs

dashboardPage.PushNotificationWarning: You won’t be receiving the push notifications from Tattlebox, to change this allow sending push notification from phone setting

noDataFound: No sensor data within last 30 days
networkAlert: Can not set Goals without connectivity. Please check your connectivity.
serverAlert: Server is unresponsive. Please try again later.
noConnectivity: No connectivity to the Internet. Please connect to the internet.
syncInProgress: Sync is in progress. Please wait for it to complete.
